meanings.definition: Full of clutter; messy or disorganized.
meanings.sent1: Her room was cluttery with toys scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The garage looked cluttery with tools strewn all over the floor.
meanings.sent3: The cluttery desk made it impossible to find her favorite pen.
meanings.sent4: The cluttery thoughts in his mind made it hard to focus on the task at hand.
meanings.sent5: The cluttery closet resembled a tornado aftermath.

meanings.definition: A place or space that is cluttered or disorganized.
meanings.sent1: The attic was a cluttery mess of old furniture and boxes.
meanings.sent2: The cluttery of the living room made it hard to walk through.
meanings.sent3: The cluttery of the kitchen drawers made finding a spoon an adventure.
meanings.sent4: The cluttery of the office resembled a chaotic maze of papers.
meanings.sent5: The cluttery of the basement was like a treasure trove waiting to be discovered.
